comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Mary Hoyt Wiborg (January 28, 1888 - ?) was a New York City socialite. She wrote the play Taboo in 1922 that featured Paul Robeson. I have written a short biography and added it to Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Hoyt_Wiborg

comment._content: Leta Pell Wright was mentioned as a close friend of Madeleine Talmadge Force in 1911: www.encyclopedia-titanica.org/col-astor-wed-madeleine-for... Madeleine Force: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2969697028/]
